title: Constellations (Black) Cell Phone Card Holder Stretchy Wallet Pocket Credit Card ID Case Pouch Sleeve 3M Adhesive Sticker Compatible with iPhone Samsung Galaxy Android Smartphones
features: Quality Material: This phone wallet pocket is made of quality PU fabric, stretchy and durable, so it can hold the card tightly on the back of the phone and the self-adhesive design allows you to paste it on the back of the phone easily. It won't lose strength due to pocket heat, light moisture, or sweat, and it won't leave a sticky residue if you choose to remove it.

Proper Size: Each phone card wallet measures about 3.5 x 2.4 inch/ 9 x 6.2 cm, a suitable size for most cell phones, this phone pocket holder provides an easy and convenient way for you to carry your card, and say goodbye to the old-fashioned and heavy wallet and enjoy convenient life with TWSZGD phone card holder! Before purchasing, please see if the size of the phone card pack is suitable for your phone, so as not to be unsuitable.

Reasonable Design: The design of pockets allows you to easily hold 2 - 3 credit cards, suitable for ID cards, earphones, coins, keys, driver's licenses, business cards, membership cards, credit cards, insurance cards, discount cards, frequent flyer cards, and other small stuff, The firm structure prevents cards or keys from falling out of the pocket even if the pocket is downward, safe, and reliable to use. And no more wallet is needed when you are out. Just take a phone with this cardholder.

Multifunctional: Besides a stick wallet for your phone, you can also stick it on car windows, car dashboards, refrigerator doors, home front doors, etc to get extra storage space. You can buy multiple quantities to meet your daily use and replacement needs, and for future use, or share them with your loved ones, family, and friend. With a variety of personalized designs, you can choose one as a surprise life or holiday gift.

How to Use:1. Clean the back of the mobile device. 2. Remove the adhesive film. 3. Stick the cell phone credit card holder on the back of the phone and hold it for a few minutes to secure it. If you move it, it also doesn't leave a sticky residue on your phone case or phone. ( Notes: Make-up remover can help you if residue leaves). Note: For that phone back the material is glass(anti-fingerprint function), and the sticker will not work, so please apply the sleeve on the phone case.
description: Simplify your life and abandon your bulky wallet. Gone are the days when you need to carry a giant wallet when all you really need is some cash and a card. This PU pocket is the perfect accessory to your phone that you'll never live without. A cell phone card holder adds much-needed value to your phone, bag, vehicle, or travel accessories. TWSZGD phone card holder is your best choice when you want to go out for a stroll, but don't want to carry your wallet!
Fill it up with 3 cards, no more need for a bulky wallet or purse. Just slip your credit cards, ID, and some cash into the cardholder and you're ready to go!
It's so thin and compact that won't add bulk or make your phone harder to carry even when in a front pocket, purse, or handbag. Preserves your phone's beauty with a slim and soft feeling.
3M adhesive securely attaches to the back of any smartphones or phone cases, and won't come off until you remove it.
Firmly hold all the items you can fit in for your convenience and prevents the content of the pocket from falling, even when the pocket is upside down!
More Multiple Use Than Your Expectation

Not only used as a phone card holder but these adhesive pockets can also be used as a secret pocket in a personal locker, glove box organizer for parking cards or cash, a remote control holder on the back of the TV, or even as a hidden compartment for your gym bag.
Compatible with nearly all smartphones including iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, LG, HTC, EVO, Nexus, and many more.
